name: Joe Vitale
what_you_do: Personal development expert helping people manifest their desires and create the lives they want through mentoring, books, and educational programs.
who_you_serve: People seeking personal transformation, breakthrough from victimhood, and mindset reprogramming.
social_proof: Star of the blockbuster hit movie The Secret; author of over 75 books; over 35 years of experience helping people; has helped thousands at live events and millions through the internet, books, and educational programs.
signature_programs: The New Awakening, Zero Limits Revolution, 15-Day Personal Revolution (free mentoring program)
business_focus: Helping individuals transform their mindset and manifest their desired life through mentoring, books, and educational programs.
service_provided: Personal mentoring, online educational programs, live events, books, digital courses
